basic.description: This course covers retrosynthetic analysis and synthetic strategy. Applications of the following topics to total synthesis: enolate chemistry; Diels-Alder; Claisen, Cope reactions; fragmentation reactions; photochemical reactions; stereochemistry and conformational analysis; blocking and protecting groups.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: Advanced Organic Synthesis

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Mastery of undergraduate organic chemistry.
